Package icyllis.arc3d.engine

Interface Engine

All Known Implementing Classes:
GLDevice, GpuDevice, VulkanDevice
public interface Engine
Shared constants, enums and utilities for Arc 3D Engine.

    Engine.BufferUsageFlags
    Describes the intended usage (type + access) a GPU buffer.
    static interface 
    Engine.GLBackendState
    A Context's cache of backend context state can be partially invalidated.
    static interface 
    Engine.IOType
    Indicates the type of pending IO operations that can be recorded for GPU resources.

    Engine.LoadOp
    Load ops.
    static interface 
    Engine.LoadStoreOps
    Combination of load ops and store ops.

    Geometric primitives used for drawing.
    static interface 
    Engine.ShaderFlags
    Shader flags.
    static interface 
    Engine.StoreOp
    Store ops.
    static interface 
    Engine.SurfaceOrigin
    Image and Surfaces can be stored such that (0, 0) in texture space may correspond to either the upper-left or lower-left content pixel.
    static interface 
    Engine.VertexAttribType
    Types used to describe format of vertices in arrays.

      • Constant Field Values

    • MASK_FORMAT_A8

      static final int MASK_FORMAT_A8
      Mask formats. Used by the font atlas. Important that these are 0-based.

      Using L-shift to get the number of bytes-per-pixel for the specified mask format.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values
